games.name: Grand Theft Auto IV: The Complete Edition

achievements.name: Off The Boat
achievements.description: Complete the first mission.

achievements.name: Fed The Fish
achievements.description: Complete the mission "Uncle Vlad".

achievements.name: Lowest Point
achievements.description: Complete mission "Roman's Sorrow".

achievements.name: Driving Mr. Bellic
achievements.description: Unlock the special ability of taxi.

achievements.name: Warm Coffee
achievements.description: Successfully date a girl to be invited into her house.

achievements.name: Full Exploration
achievements.description: Unlock all the islands.

achievements.name: TLAD: One Percenter
achievements.description: Help Billy get his bike back. (The Lost and Damned)

achievements.name: Impossible Trinity
achievements.description: Complete mission "Museum Piece".

achievements.name: Half Million
achievements.description: Reach a balance of $500,000.

achievements.name: Walk Free
achievements.description: Lose a 4 star wanted rating by outrunning the cops.

achievements.name: Gracefully Taken
achievements.description: Complete mission "I'll Take Her".

achievements.name: That Special Someone
achievements.description: Complete mission "That Special Someone".

achievements.name: Pool Shark
achievements.description: Beat a friend at pool.

achievements.name: Retail Therapy
achievements.description: Unlock the special ability of buying guns from a friend.

achievements.name: Wheelie Rider
achievements.description: Do a wheelie lasting at least 500 feet on a motorbike.

achievements.name: You Won!
achievements.description: Complete the final mission.

achievements.name: TLAD: The Lost Boy
achievements.description: Become leader of The Lost. (The Lost and Damned)

achievements.name: Liberty City Minute
achievements.description: Complete the story missions in less than 30 hours.

achievements.name: One Hundred And Eighty
achievements.description: In a darts game score 180 with 3 darts.

achievements.name: It'll Cost Ya
achievements.description: Complete a taxi ride without skipping from one island to another.

achievements.name: TBoGT: Diamonds Forever
achievements.description: Complete the Trinity. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: TLAD: Easy Rider
achievements.description: Finish the story. (The Lost and Damned)

achievements.name: Assassin's Greed
achievements.description: Complete all 9 assassin missions.

achievements.name: Order Fulfilled
achievements.description: Complete all 10 Exotic Export orders.

achievements.name: Gobble Gobble
achievements.description: Score 3 strikes in a row, a turkey, in 10-pin bowling.

achievements.name: TBoGT: Maestro
achievements.description: Finish the Ballad. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: One Man Army
achievements.description: Survive 5 minutes on 6 star wanted level.

achievements.name: That's How We Roll!
achievements.description: Unlock the special ability of helicopter.

achievements.name: Courier Service
achievements.description: Complete all 10 package delivery jobs.

achievements.name: Cleaned The Mean Streets
achievements.description: Capture 20 criminals through the police computer.

achievements.name: Dial B For Bomb
achievements.description: Unlock the special ability of phoning for a bomb to be placed.

achievements.name: Manhunt
achievements.description: Complete the most wanted side missions from the police computer.

achievements.name: Key To The City
achievements.description: Achieve 100% in "Game progress" statistic.

achievements.name: King of QUB3D
achievements.description: Beat the High Score in QUB3D.

achievements.name: TLAD: Full Chat
achievements.description: Build Terry and Clay's toughness to 100%. (The Lost and Damned)

achievements.name: Chain Reaction
achievements.description: You must blow up 10 vehicles in 10 seconds.

achievements.name: TBoGT: Adrenaline Junkie
achievements.description: Freefall for the longest possible time. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: Rolled Over
achievements.description: Do 5 car rolls in a row from one crash.

achievements.name: TBoGT: Catch the Bus
achievements.description: Dance perfectly in both Tony's nightclubs. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: TBoGT: Snow Queen
achievements.description: Complete 25 drug wars. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: TBoGT: Gone Down
achievements.description: Complete all base jumps. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: TBoGT: Four Play
achievements.description: Hit a flag with a golf ball four times. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: TBoGT: Bear Fight
achievements.description: Win the L.C. Cage Fighters championship. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: You Got The Message
achievements.description: Deliver all 30 cars ordered through text message.

achievements.name: TLAD: Get Good Wood
achievements.description: In the bike races, whack off 69 bikers with a bat. (The Lost and Damned)

achievements.name: Endangered Species
achievements.description: Collect every hidden package in the game.

achievements.name: Dare Devil
achievements.description: Complete 100% of the unique stunt jumps.

achievements.name: Finish Him
achievements.description: Complete 10 melee counters in 4 minutes.

achievements.name: No More Strangers
achievements.description: Meet all random characters.

achievements.name: Sightseer
achievements.description: Fly on all helicopter tours of Liberty City.

achievements.name: Liberty City (5)
achievements.description: After meeting all possible friends, the ones left alive all like you above 90%.

achievements.name: Under The Radar
achievements.description: Fly underneath the main bridges in the game that cross water with a helicopter.

achievements.name: Genetically Superior
achievements.description: Come first in 20 singleplayer street races.

achievements.name: TBoGT: Past the Velvet Rope
achievements.description: Score 80% or above in all missions. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)

achievements.name: TBoGT: Gold Star
achievements.description: Score 100% in all missions. (The Ballad of Gay Tony)
